1572260.name: Wild Ice
1572260.description:
Get ready for the ultimate face-off!

In this tower defense gong show, small town hockey players Max and Finley must adapt their skills to a frozen apocalypse and bring back the warmth. Play solo or couch co-op as you activate furnaces across the world and hold the line against waves of frost zombies using a combination of slap shots, trap building and fisticuffs to both bring (and bring back) the heat!

Key Features

  • Trap Building - Build and upgrade a variety of makeshift traps like puck launchers, barricades, and other hockey-inspired contraptions.

  • Strategic Defense - Each furnace is a self-contained tower defense battle. Plan your setup, protect the heat, and survive escalating waves of enemies. 

  • Hockey Fueled Combat - Slapshots, slashing, and body checks - use your sweet hockey skills to take down any frost zombies that slip past your defenses.

  • Multiple Difficulty Modes - From Rookie to Veteran, choose a difficulty that fits your skill level.

  • Replayability - Every furnace features a scoring system, giving you plenty of chances for new plays and epic comebacks!

  • Between Battles - Stay warm, recover health, and gather resources as you travel to the next furnace.

  • Story - Follow Max and Finley's journey from small-town underdogs to unlikely heroes as they uncover the mystery behind the endless frost.

  • Character Customization - Deck out your characters in different gear.
